alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; Iberville; Northern Livingston; West Baton Rouge; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Ascension, southeastern West Baton Rouge, northwestern Livingston, southeastern Iberville and southeastern East Baton Rouge Parishes through 400 PM CDT... At 329 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gardere, or near Plaquemine, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Denham Springs, Plaquemine, Port Allen, Oak Hills Place, St. Gabriel, Walker, Addis, Brusly, White Castle, Livingston, Port Vincent, Westminster, Old Jefferson, Merrydale, Inniswold, Watson, Prairieville, Village St. George and Shenandoah. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 151 and 174. Interstate 12 between mile markers 1 and 24. Interstate 110 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 5. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; Iberville; Northern Livingston; West Baton Rouge; Western Ascension
